channel.title: Object Model help
channel.description:
Hello, i need help with my model. i recolored a furnace and added in my client, but my furnace is bugged :( [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/29gjyj8.png[/img]
Is this because it is bigger than 1 sqaure, the ints are not setted correctly or it is just the model ?
Thanks in advance , magnet[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2009, 04:04:25 pm[/size][hr]Fixed it myself
Solution:
[code] if(i == ####)// Desired Object id { class46.aString739 = "####"; //object name class46.aByteArray777 = "####".getBytes(); //examine class46.anInt744 = 3; // size N to S class46.anInt761 = 3; // size W to E class46.anIntArray773 = new int[1]; class46.anIntArray773[0] = ####; // Model id class46.aBoolean778 = true; // clickable class46.aBoolean767 = true; // noclip class46.aBoolean762 = false; // class46.aBoolean769 = false; // delete colors } [/code]
Close please

item.title: Object Model help
item.dc:creator: @magnet magnet
item.description:
@magnet wrote:

Hello, i need help with my model.
i recolored a furnace and added in my client,
but my furnace is bugged

Is this because it is bigger than 1 sqaure, the ints are not setted correctly or it is just the model ?

Thanks in advance , magnet[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 23, 2009, 04:04:25 pm[/size][hr]Fixed it myself

Solution:

            if(i == ####)// Desired Object id
           {
            class46.aString739 = "####"; //object name
            class46.aByteArray777 = "####".getBytes(); //examine
            class46.anInt744 = 3; // size N to S
            class46.anInt761 = 3; // size W to E
            class46.anIntArray773 = new int[1];
            class46.anIntArray773[0] = ####; // Model id
            class46.aBoolean778 = true; // clickable
            class46.aBoolean767 = true; // noclip
            class46.aBoolean762 = false; // 
            class46.aBoolean769 = false; // delete colors
}

Close please

Read full topic
